greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = 8*a(n-1) - 4*a(n-2), where a(0) = 1, a(1) = 4.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (8,-4).
formula: G.f.: G(0)/2, where G(k)= 1 + 1/(1 - x*(3*k-4)/(x*(3*k-1) - 1/G(k+1))); (continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, May 28 2013
program: (Sage) [lucas_number2(n,8,4)/2 for n in range(0,21)] # _Zerinvary Lajos_, Jul 08 2008
(MAGMA) m:=20; R<x>:=PowerSeriesRing(Integers(), m); Coefficients(R!( (1-4*x)/(1-8*x+4*x^2) )); // _G. C. Greubel_, Feb 03 2019
results.author: _Philippe Deléham_, Feb 29 2004
